svg.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) / OpenAPI Server Overview

g.text: Model Context Protocol (MCP) / OpenAPI Server Overview
The client app uses mcp-use to connect to
which server to use for each task.
This enables modular, agent-based orchestration of AI workflows.
, allowing adaptive deployments tailored to different
Language models (e.g. OpenAI, Ollama, DeepSeek) are accessed via standard
, abstracting away vendor-specific logic and enabling seamless
Agents can be granted selective access to tools (e.g. files, APIs, memory) via centralized
configuration in mcp-use, ensuring intentional permissioning and reduced risk of unintended
mcp-use is designed to operate in
